full_threads.body:
Morning Michael, 

Sorry for the delayed response, I was making sure we had access to action your updates. Great news, we absolutely can assist.

Can you please tell me the hours you wish update? 

Sun -

Mon -

Tues -

Wed -

Thurs -

Fri -

Sat -

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi There,

Thank you for this information. Are you able to assist with updating our hours on google ? I tried but had no luck.
Regards,

Michael Beshara

Please note that my working days are Monday to Thursday.

General Manager

P. 1300 732 240

E. michael@concretescanningservices.com.au <mailto:michael@concretescanningservices.com.au>
W. www.concretescanningservices.com.au <http://concretescanningservices.com.au/>
A. PO Box 202 Waverley NSW 2024

<https://concretescanningservices.com.au/>

Insights & Updates
APRIL 2022
Hi Jennifer,
Greetings from our pack! In this month's newsletter you will find:
Top tips to find more clients online
Making your website accessibility friendly
How to update your Easter long weekend trading hours on Google
An introduction to our newest team member!
On a side note, you may have heard whispers about the new tax break to encourage small businesses to invest in their digital capabilities. It's an excellent time to invest in your business's online presence. We'll give you the low-down in our upcoming newsletters.

Enjoy the read!

Heath Maguire
Creative Director
Fresh from our blog
<https://wolfiq.us7.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3ae5ea065cd4c3f0d9b1158f0&id=a4e91f62fe&e=a8a8d9ef04>
Want more clients? Write for them!
How often are your prospective clients going to Google and asking questions that you can help with? Help them to find you and the answers they are searching for!

Read our blog article for more
<https://wolfiq.us7.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3ae5ea065cd4c3f0d9b1158f0&id=0d3c18595f&e=a8a8d9ef04>

An inclusive website makes good business sense
The World Health Organization indicates that approximately 15% of the world's population lives with some form of disability. How accessibility friendly is your website?

Check out our best practice examples
<https://wolfiq.us7.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3ae5ea065cd4c3f0d9b1158f0&id=7e1ddf4a43&e=a8a8d9ef04>

Don't forget to tell your customers (and Google) about your Easter long weekend trading hours.

Chris shows you how in this 3 min video. As always, reach out if you need a hand.
Watch on YouTube
<https://wolfiq.us7.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3ae5ea065cd4c3f0d9b1158f0&id=41b2e343c3&e=a8a8d9ef04>
Welcome to the fam!

Welcome to the new kid on the block!

Andrea recently joined the team as our Marketing Consultant & Copywriter and works with clients to craft content for their websites, blog articles, promotional materials and more!

Andrea has more than ten years of experience in consumer marketing and brings a wealth of strategic know-how to our team. She is customer-obsessed and loves working with clients to deliver effective marketing campaigns to enhance brand awareness, improve customer experience, and ultimately increase revenue.
Tech Tip!

Are you a one-finger keyboard bandit? Hate typing?
Use your voice in Google Docs!

Open a new document in Google Docs, then select ‘Voice Typing’ from the Tools menu. Start dictating my friends.

Voice Typing recognises commands like “comma,” “period,” and “new paragraph”.

It works surprisingly well!
